languages.text:
Whenever the wearer fails to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} an attack, they can re-roll the parry {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once.
If they wield dual {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, they can re-roll the parry test twice.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer fails to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} an attack, they can reroll the parry test once.
If they wield dual melee weapons, they can reroll the parry test twice.

Whenever the wearer fails to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} an attack, they can reroll the parry {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once.
If they wield dual {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, they can reroll the parry test twice.

Whenever the wearer fails to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} an attack, they can reroll the parry {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once.
If they wield dual {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, they can reroll the parry test twice.

languages.text:
当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击失败时，可以重骰招架{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。
如果装备者双持{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器，则可以重骰两次招架检定。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer fails to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} an attack, they can reroll the parry {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once.
If they wield dual {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, they can reroll the parry test twice.

traits.locale_text:
当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击失败时，可以重骰招架{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。
如果装备者双持近战武器，则可以重骰两次招架检定。

languages.text:
Когда персонажу не удается {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} атаку, он может один раз повторить попытку парирования.
Если он использует два {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашных{/g} оружия, то может повторять попытку до двух раз.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer fails to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} an attack, they can reroll the parry {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once.
If they wield dual {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, they can reroll the parry test twice.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонажу не удается {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} атаку, он может один раз повторить попытку парирования.
Если он использует два рукопашных оружия, то может повторить попытку до двух раз.

Когда персонажу не удается {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} атаку, он может один раз повторить попытку парирования.
Если он использует два рукопашных оружия, то может повторить попытку до двух раз.

languages.text:
使用者が攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}に失敗するたびに、受け流し{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を1回リロールできる。
{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器を2本扱っている場合、受け流し判定を2回リロールできる。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer fails to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} an attack, they can reroll the parry {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once.
If they wield dual {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, they can reroll the parry test twice.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}に失敗するたびに、受け流し{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を1回リロールできる。
近接武器を2本扱っている場合、受け流し判定を2回リロールできる。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador falla una {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}, puede volver a tirar la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de parada una vez más.
Si lleva armas {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} duales, puede volver a tirar la prueba de parada dos veces.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer fails to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} an attack, they can re-roll the parry {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once.
If they wield dual {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, they can re-roll the parry test twice.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador falla una {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}, puede volver a tirar la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de parada una vez más.
Si lleva armas cuerpo a cuerpo duales, puede volver a tirar la prueba de parada dos veces.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger einen Angriff erfolglos {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, kann er für die Parieren-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} einmal erneut würfeln.
Führt er {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffenpaar{/g}, kann er für die Parieren-Probe zweimal erneut würfeln.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer fails to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} an attack, they can re-roll the parry {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once.
If they wield dual {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, they can re-roll the parry test twice.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger einen Angriff erfolglos {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, kann er für die Parieren-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} einmal erneut würfeln.
Wenn er ein Nahkampfwaffenpaar führt, kann er für die Parieren-Probe zweimal erneut würfeln.

languages.text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur ne parvient pas à {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} une attaque, il peut retenter le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de parade en relançant les dés une fois.
S'il manie deux armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, il peut retenter le test de parade en relançant les dés deux fois.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer fails to {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} an attack, they can re-roll the parry {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} once.
If they wield dual {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons, they can re-roll the parry test twice.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur ne parvient pas à {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} une attaque, il peut retenter le {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de parade en relançant les dés une fois.
S'il manie deux armes de mêlée, il peut retenter le test de parade en relançant les dés deux fois.

S'il manie deux armes de mêlée, il peut retenter le test de parade en relançant les dés deux fois.
